speaker: Old Man
text: Threescore and ten I can remember well,

speaker: Old Man
text: Within the volume of which time I have seen

speaker: Old Man
text: Hours dreadful and things strange, but this sore

speaker: Old Man
text: Even like the deed that’s done. On Tuesday last

speaker: Old Man
text: A falcon, tow’ring in her pride of place,

speaker: Old Man
text: Was by a mousing owl hawked at and killed.

speaker: Old Man
text: God’s benison go with you and with those

speaker: Old Man
text: That would make good of bad and friends of foes.
